treaty_type.description: Type of treaty - MDP (Mutual Defense Pact), ODoAP (Optional Defense Optional Aggression Pact), MDoAP (Mutual Defense Optional Aggression Pact), Protectorate, Extension, NAP (Non-Aggression Pact)

alliance_1_id.description: ID of the first alliance in the treaty

alliance_2_id.description: ID of the second alliance in the treaty

proposed_by_alliance_id.description: ID of the alliance that proposed this treaty

terms.description: Detailed terms and conditions of the treaty

duration_days.description: Duration of the treaty in days (null for indefinite)

expires_at.description: When the treaty expires (calculated from duration_days)

signed_at.description: When the treaty was signed/became active

cancelled_by_alliance_id.description: ID of the alliance that cancelled the treaty
